name: Passage(s)
description:
A game about passage and gears. 

MADE FOR LUDUM DARE JAM 36Theme: Ancient Technology

Short puzzle game with gears.
One-man team for my first Ludum Dare.

CONTROLS
Keyboard or Gamepad or Touch

  • Move  : "WASD", "ZQSD", "arrows" or Gamepad or Touch left & right
  • Action : "CTRL", ButtonX, TouchAction
  • Jump : "Space", ButtonA, TouchJump
  • Restart : "R", "Enter", ButtonB, TouchRestart
